intro: Lombard LBTC is a wrapped bitcoin asset that represents bitcoin staked into the Babylon protocol.

risk_factors: Has mint authority - tokens can be minted
Has freeze authority - accounts can be frozen

authority_analyses.mint_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='2YB3LPB4Tdb1ccmEFqhK3ZEKLFzCPayUwzEU5J1DXSzK', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Mint unlimited tokens', 'Change mint authority to any address', 'Burn tokens from any account', 'Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})
authority_analyses.freeze_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='HzCyQqcAoxAHeqHAWH1RQbfw7GNUzinqSWideGj7ZtEE', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Freeze any token account instantly', 'Unfreeze any token account instantly', 'Change freeze authority to any address', 'Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})
authority_analyses.update_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='HzCyQqcAoxAHeqHAWH1RQbfw7GNUzinqSWideGj7ZtEE', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})

recommendations: Consider decentralizing mint_authority - current setup is high risk
Consider decentralizing freeze_authority - current setup is high risk
Consider decentralizing update_authority - current setup is high risk

key_findings: Contract has a freeze authority, which means that the token can be frozen and individual users can be censored.
Lombard LBTC is bridged to Solana from Ethereum via LayerZero.
The token contract is ultimately upgraded by a 3/5 multisig. The LomP48F7bLbKyMRHHsDVt7wuHaUQvQnVVspjcbfuAek contract can be upgraded by HzCyQqcAoxAHeqHAWH1RQbfw7GNUzinqSWideGj7ZtEE.
The HzCyQqcAoxAHeqHAWH1RQbfw7GNUzinqSWideGj7ZtEE 3/5 multisig is responsible for adding and removing various roles associated with the token contract.
